commit message:
Implemented Routing function to convert ArrayList<POI> to ArrayList<Geopoint> (untested!)
The Getter for the POI's name now returns a capitalized answer

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added default statement for a switch in HomeActivity.java

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Changed method names (not using underscores anymore)

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Refactored the way we handle the JSON returned by the API; now has its own method in POI.java

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added a popup in case the download of the API response fails
Moved some more logic out of Map.java

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

(First) Implementation of a Snackbar, to indicate to the user that the app is downloading

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added another Snackbar while the GPS is fixing the position
Also added some JavaDoc to a function

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Implemented Material theme on newer Android devices
